chapter.text: You run down the hall, looking for somewhere to hide. ^1500You turn the corner and are met with a brick wall. ^1500Dead end. ^1500This wall wasnâ€™t here before. ^1500You turn the other way and run. ^1500Another dead end. ^1500You turn around to run back the way you came. ^1500You stand face to face with the monster. ^1500It slowly approaches you. ^1500A heaviness with every step.
